name: cogl
deps: cairo, gdk_pixbuf, glu, mesa, pango, gobject_introspection, gst_plugins_base, sdl, wayland
desc:
Cogl is a modern 3D graphics API with associated utility APIs 
designed to expose the features of 3D graphics hardware using a direct 
state access API design, as opposed to the state-machine 
style of OpenGL.
